summary: Imagine your mind has been wiped: memories, knowledge, experiences, language - every word you ever spoke, has vanished. If eventually you found the words, what would you say? For Edwyn Collins, 'The Possibilities Are Endless'.
cast: Edwyn Collins|Grace Maxwell|William Collins|Yasmin Paige|Findlay Adams|Rosemary Findlay|William Jappy|Aaron Grant|Andy Sutherland|Duncan MacKay|Finbar Plass|Heather Mason|Podi Plass|Ruth Dudgeon|Toby Woodward|Conan O'Brien
title: The Possibilities Are Endless
